messages.message:
Hi everyone, turns out I brought us into Node 22-world a little earlier than expected after migrating DM to 22 - I didn’t realize we ran control plane in crafting environments. If you run into issues related to Node 22.14.0 not being installed, you can fix this by running:
```nodenv install 22.14.0
cd core-services/control-plane
npm install -g yarn
npm install -g @bazel/bazelisk```
thanks @neerad.phansalkar @jemin.jain for helping debug this!
@William Helmrath should we add node v22 to the crafting baseimage?
Eventually, but I don’t want to replace v18 until we’ve merged in the migration PR
Unless we can have both during the transition period

Nodenv will allow both to be installed, but I think it will only support one default. Not sure if that matters in this case, since nodenv also looks at the .node-version file anyway to select the right version.
